item.title: Top 5 Air Purifiers in India for 2025
item.description:
Looking for the best air purifier for your home or office? Here’s our curated list of the top 5 air purifiers in India for 2025:

  1. Dyson Pure Cool Link â€“ Premium air purification with bladeless fan.
  2. Mi Air Purifier 3 â€“ Smart features with HEPA filtration.
  3. Philips AC2887 â€“ Reliable brand, strong CADR performance.
  4. Honeywell Air Touch i8 â€“ Compact, silent and child-safe.
  5. Sharp FP-F40E-W â€“ Japanese technology with Plasmacluster ions.

All models offer high filtration efficiency and are ideal for urban homes.

item.title: Top 5 Microwave Ovens for Indian Kitchens
item.description:
Here are the 5 most recommended microwave ovens for Indian homes:

  1. Samsung 28L Convection Microwave â€“ Best for baking and grilling.
  2. LG 32L All-in-One Oven â€“ Great for large families.
  3. IFB 25L Convection Microwave â€“ Reliable, with Indian cooking presets.
  4. Panasonic 27L Grill Microwave â€“ Compact and powerful.
  5. Morphy Richards 23MCG â€“ Budget-friendly convection cooking.

These are ideal for reheating, baking, grilling, and Indian dishes.
